mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_details(id, username, age, email, address, user_password) VALUES (#{id},#{username},#{age},#{email},#{address},#{user_password})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_details set id=#{id},username=#{username}, age=#{age},email=#{email},address=#{address},user_password=#{user_password} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT 1 FROM user_details WHERE username=#{username} LIMIT 1
SELECT user_password FROM user_details WHERE username=#{username} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM user_details WHERE username=#{username} LIMIT 1
